page.title: 03EDUCATION SCHOOL EMPLOYEES
page.content: Teaching Staff:Head-Mr.P.Mostert;Deputy-Miss J.Morgan;Mr.E.W.Thomas,M/S.E.Williams, M.Evans,G.Jones,Rh.Jones. Mrs.N.Bonds-Nursery assistant. Canteen Staff-Mrs.N.Thomas,E.Jones,B.Jones,R.E dwards Cleaners-Mrs.L.Williams,E.Edwards. Supervisors(lunchtime)-Mrs.E.Edwards,M .Roberts,Mair Roberts. Miss Morgan had a headmistress's job to start in September.Mr.E.W.Thomas will be acting deputyhead. Some of the teachers went on strike and all the children had to go home at dinner time and not allowed to return to school before 12:50.
